Key Match Events: Jaden Hardy scored a season-high 25 points in the game against the Portland Trail Blazers.
Jaden Hardy made 55.6% of his shots from 3-point range since Dec. 28.
Dereck Lively II had a plus-15 rating, the highest on the team, while Jaden Hardy had a plus-13 rating.
Pre-Game Insights: Chauncey Billups mentioned Jaden Hardy as a player who could be looking to prove himself with Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving sidelined.
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Kidd praised Jaden Hardy for his offensive and defensive contributions, stating that he is starting to get into a groove.
Jaden Hardy attributed his offensive uptick to consistent preparation, including extra work, extra film, and asking coaches questions.
Jaden Hardy expressed his commitment to bringing energy and making an impact whenever he is on the court.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaden Hardy wears No. 1 because of Chauncey Billups, one of his favorite players growing up in Detroit.
Jaden Hardy signed a three-year, $18 million extension with the Mavericks before the season began.
